name: Music II
description: Challenge yourself with more questions related to music genres, famous artists, and musical instruments.

questions.description: Which legendary guitarist is known for his iconic performance of 'Stairway to Heaven'?
What is the name of the traditional Korean zither-like instrument?
Which composer is famous for his 'Ode to Joy' in the final movement of Symphony No. 9?
What musical term indicates a gradual increase in volume?
Which rock band is known for their hit song 'Hotel California'?
What is the name of the woodwind instrument often associated with jazz and blues?
Who composed the famous ballet 'Swan Lake'?
What is the term for a musical composition written for a solo instrument accompanied by an orchestra?
Which pop superstar released the album 'Thriller,' featuring hits like 'Billie Jean' and 'Beat It'?
What is the name of the percussion instrument consisting of wooden bars struck with mallets?
